verbose_text: siRNA knockdown of CLASP1 resulted in a further increase in MT growth speed and growth lifetimes on both ECMs, but caused the most significant increase in ECs cultured on fibronectin ECMs (growth speed increase = 75.9%; growth lifetime increase = 72.3%).
evidence: CLASP1 resulted in a further increase in MT growth speed and growth lifetimes on both ECMs, but caused the most significant increase in ECs
